sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Removed the Service Baseline feature. This feature was introduced in Fuji but is deprecated in Geneva because this functionality is incorporated in the Service Model</description>
        <name>Deprecate Service Baseline Feature</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[removeData();

function removeData(){
	//Remove left hand menu item
	var menu = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
	if(menu.get("356876133723210052e2cc028e41f163"))
		menu.deleteRecord();

	var exclusionMenu = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
	if(exclusionMenu.get("e03f5851d7403100c1ed0fbc5e610395"))
		exclusionMenu.deleteRecord();
	
	//Remove Processor Record
	var processor = new GlideRecord("sys_processor");
	if(processor.get("58d32ac33763210052e2cc028e41f1e3"))
		processor.deleteRecord();
	
	//Delete Baseline Dump table
	GlideSystemUtilDB.dropTable("svc_baseline_dump");

	//Delete Baseline CI table 
	GlideSystemUtilDB.dropTable("svc_baseline_ci");

	//Delete Baseline Dirty table 
	GlideSystemUtilDB.dropTable("svc_baseline_dirty");
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-06-26 21:40:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>142cfe03d7300200c1ed0fbc5e61031a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Deprecate Service Baseline Feature</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">c60efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_142cfe03d7300200c1ed0fbc5e61031a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2015-06-26 21:40:23</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
